page.description: The USER_VARIABLES_ENUM() function returns a CR-LF delimited list of user variables in the variable frame referenced by Pointer.

argument.name: Var_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of user variables.

argument.name: variables
argument.description: Pointer A pointer to a variable frame.

page.example: ? user_variables_enum(global_variables() ) = ats mts sts ots ets dts wts
